question: Some people believe that giving longer prison sentences is the best way to reduce crime. Others believe that there are better ways to reduce crime. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
text: There is no doubt these days the crimes are playing a major problem in our lives. However the question: Does the prison period have a positive relationship with the instance of the crimes? Is considered one of the most controversial issues today. In this essay I am going to examine both viewpoints.

On one side of the argument there are people who argued that the benefits considerably outweigh the disadvantages. In main reason for believing this is the prison nowadays has different rehabilitation programs which help in to transform the people. Orange is the new black program show, for example, it shows different kinds of therapeutic sessions there were using it during the prison period to change the mindset of the crime person. On the other hand, It is also possible to consider it with the opposing case. The other argued that long time might not decrease the crime they believe that because of when they are staying a long time in prison, they will loss all the friendship they could have and once again if they did not have those therapy sessions they absolutely will feel the nation against them and they will never change their crimes attitude.
